article.title: Census Bureau Webinars - EAR Redflag
article.summary: Learn about screening your transactions, no license required (NLR) rules, sists to check before exporting, and red flags.
article.content:
Exporting EAR99 Items: Screening Your Transaction, Lists to Check and Red Flag

Watch Exporting EAR99 Items: Screening Your Transaction, Lists to Check and Red Flags, presented by U.S. Census Bureau. (10:19 mins)

Source: Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS) www.BIS.DOC.gov

  • Screening Your Transactions
  • No License Required (NLR) Rules
  • Lists to Check Before Exporting
  • Red Flag
article.seometadatadescription: Learn about screening your transactions, no license required (NLR) rules, sists to check before exporting, and red flags.
article.seometadatakeyword: EAR, redflag, export training, webinar, census bureau, NLR, no license required
